name: v11_hydrophobic_packing
description: Optimize hydrophobic contacts around TriNOx aromatic rings and tert-butyls

binding_strategy: Good contacts = hydrophobic packing around aromatics/tBu
H-bonds to N are NOT the goal - N-OH groups face metal
v6-v10 already achieved good hydrophobic contacts (2.5-3A)
Need to OPTIMIZE these contacts, not change strategy
v11_strategy: Hotspots on aromatic C's and tert-butyl C's
NO hbond conditioning (wrong for hydrophobic ligand)

test_config.name: v11_hydrophobic
test_config.description: Maximize hydrophobic packing around aromatic rings and tert-butyls
